name: Alpha Centaury V
description:
Instructions:

Use your mouse and try to read the emails for the story. And remember... it is not real!

MOBILE:  to login use the Generate Random Name Button ;-)

This Game was made for the 2022.1 brackeys game jam within a week.

All the 3D assets are made by nibe (here from itch.io)
For the rest please see credits in game ;-)
